main event: A military observer reported a sighting of a round object descending in Corong, New Mexico on August 12, 1951.
interesting points: The object displayed speed between 700-1000 mph., The object changed colors from white to orange to green., The observed size was approximately 6 inches in diameter at arm's length., The object was first sighted 45 degrees above the horizon and descended at about 60 degrees., The case was evaluated as a meteor, despite the unusual observations.
